entry.title: Can’t deposit a cheque m
entry.content: I cannot deposit a cheque. Every time I try it says, “use cheque front,” even when I am, and there used to be an option the manukau take the picture, rather than waiting for the app to recognize the cheque. Please fix!

Can’t deposit a cheque m

I cannot deposit a cheque. Every time I try it says, “use cheque front,” even when I am, and there used to be an option the manukau take the picture, rather than waiting for the app to recognize the cheque. Please fix!

entry.title: Very functional
entry.content: I've been using this app for over two years and I find it very easy to use! Sending money transfers, paying bills and so many other things are now fast to do, and I don't ever need to go to the bank! I can even deposit a cheque! Incredible! The customer service of RBC is truly the best! Thank you RBC :)

Very functional

I've been using this app for over two years and I find it very easy to use! Sending money transfers, paying bills and so many other things are now fast to do, and I don't ever need to go to the bank! I can even deposit a cheque! Incredible! The customer service of RBC is truly the best! Thank you RBC :)

entry.title: Not working properly
entry.content: This app has so many issues. Half the time I cannot deposit cheques online and have to go to the bank, which defeats the purpose of the cheque deposit function completely! Have a problem with government issued cheques (cannot read the front of the cheque) and an issue with certain bank drafts (eg BMO) - says it cannot deposit an overseas cheque. Please fix your app!!!

Not working properly

This app has so many issues. Half the time I cannot deposit cheques online and have to go to the bank, which defeats the purpose of the cheque deposit function completely! Have a problem with government issued cheques (cannot read the front of the cheque) and an issue with certain bank drafts (eg BMO) - says it cannot deposit an overseas cheque. Please fix your app!!!

entry.title: Is it ever gonna get fixed?
entry.content: I used to love this app, but for the last half a year it’s been a miserable experience. I haven’t been able to send money to my wife or anyone else for that matter (great when you have to pay rent) for over three months, and a couple other features that I don’t use as much haven’t been working. I’ve re-downloaded the app, signed in and out, even got a newer phone and the app still doesn’t work properly. It’s a real pain to have to run two towns over to go to a branch just to shuffle money around.

Is it ever gonna get fixed?

I used to love this app, but for the last half a year it’s been a miserable experience. I haven’t been able to send money to my wife or anyone else for that matter (great when you have to pay rent) for over three months, and a couple other features that I don’t use as much haven’t been working. I’ve re-downloaded the app, signed in and out, even got a newer phone and the app still doesn’t work properly. It’s a real pain to have to run two towns over to go to a branch just to shuffle money around.

entry.title: Cheque deposit
entry.content:
This issue happened a couple years ago, they fixed it, and now with the latest update its back. The cheque deposit function tries to take the picture for you but with this update, it either isn’t working or has such strict requirements for detecting the cheque that it refuses to capture a cheque on a plain dark surface.
Please fix, this is incredibly annoying and the cheque deposit option is once again useless

Cheque deposit

This issue happened a couple years ago, they fixed it, and now with the latest update its back. The cheque deposit function tries to take the picture for you but with this update, it either isn’t working or has such strict requirements for detecting the cheque that it refuses to capture a cheque on a plain dark surface.

Please fix, this is incredibly annoying and the cheque deposit option is once again useless

entry.title: Bonne app mais
entry.content:
Il s’agit d’une excellente application, mais il manque une fonctionnalité essentielle : Pouvoir programmer & voir les l’historique des transactions dans nos REER-REEI-REEE. C’est énervant de devoir aller sur le web juste pour cela.
En espérant que cet avis sera écouté! Bonne journée!
Relance! Gestion de placement via le mobile app ! S’il vous plaît!!!

Bonne app mais

Il s’agit d’une excellente application, mais il manque une fonctionnalité essentielle : Pouvoir programmer & voir les l’historique des transactions dans nos REER-REEI-REEE. C’est énervant de devoir aller sur le web juste pour cela.

En espérant que cet avis sera écouté! Bonne journée!

Relance! Gestion de placement via le mobile app ! S’il vous plaît!!!

entry.title: Very glitchy update
entry.content: The new update has made the app very glitchy and temperamental. I’ve had this app for years and this is the first time it’s been so problematic - no matter how many times I uninstall/reinstall, turn off my phone, etc., I can’t even look at account details without being automatically logged off. I end up having to go online, which defeats the purpose of the app. Can you please fix whatever’s wrong? Thanks in advance.

Very glitchy update

The new update has made the app very glitchy and temperamental. I’ve had this app for years and this is the first time it’s been so problematic - no matter how many times I uninstall/reinstall, turn off my phone, etc., I can’t even look at account details without being automatically logged off. I end up having to go online, which defeats the purpose of the app. Can you please fix whatever’s wrong? Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Worst app I’ve ever used
entry.content: App doesn’t open when I attempt. Opens the loading screen and won’t let me access my login. Tried deleting the app and re installing many times and still doesn’t work. Have to use online banking on my safari. App crashes every time I try to open my accounts. Very slow and lags. Tempted to switch bank just because I can’t do online banking off my phone. Please fix

Worst app I’ve ever used

App doesn’t open when I attempt. Opens the loading screen and won’t let me access my login. Tried deleting the app and re installing many times and still doesn’t work. Have to use online banking on my safari. App crashes every time I try to open my accounts. Very slow and lags. Tempted to switch bank just because I can’t do online banking off my phone. Please fix

entry.title: Feedback
entry.content: I love the RBC app since it’s so convinient than logging onto the website, I wish it was easier to pay or balances on my credit card by just clicking the expense and having an option to pay it back right away by choosing the appropriate account. Other than that I love the app.

Feedback
